string-array.name: tableCreator
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE Admin (employeeId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, username TEXT, password TEXT, firstname TEXT, lastname TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Program (programCode TEXT PRIMARY KEY, programName TEXT, tuitionFee NUMERIC, duration INTEGER, semester INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE Payment (paymentId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, studentId INTEGER, programCode TEXT, totalAmount NUMERIC, amountPaid NUMERIC, balance NUMERIC, paymentDate INTEGER, status TEXT);
